detaileddescription.para:
Transforms Doxygen XML output into a GitHub flavored markdown based HTML format.
Its primary goal is to embed its output files into the GitHub markdown browser. The embedded content serves the same purpose as a static site. Except that it is more integrated with the GitHub site.

listitem.para: Project Structure Illustrates the project's library and executable dependency structure.
Site Layout Illustrates the structure of the generated site.
Image handling Describes the way internal icons are accessed.
